g.style: box-sizing: content-box; position: absolute; left: 0px; shape-rendering: geometricprecision; pointer-events: none;

path.style: stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(99, 110, 250); fill-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0; opacity: 1;
stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(239, 85, 59); fill-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0; opacity: 1;
stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(0, 204, 150); fill-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0; opacity: 1;
stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(99, 110, 250); fill-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0; opacity: 1;
stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(171, 99, 250); fill-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0; opacity: 1;
stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(239, 85, 59); fill-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0; opacity: 1;
stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(255, 161, 90); fill-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0; opacity: 1;
stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(25, 211, 243); fill-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0; opacity: 1;
stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(255, 102, 146); fill-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0; opacity: 1;

rect.style: stroke-width: 0.5; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(211, 211, 211); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: default; font-family: 'Open Sans', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(42, 63, 95); fill-opacity: 1; text-shadow: rgb(255, 255, 255) 1px 1px 1px, rgb(255, 255, 255) -1px -1px 1px, rgb(255, 255, 255) 1px -1px 1px, rgb(255, 255, 255) -1px 1px 1px; white-space: pre;

rect.style: stroke-width: 0.5; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(211, 211, 211); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: default; font-family: 'Open Sans', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(42, 63, 95); fill-opacity: 1; text-shadow: rgb(255, 255, 255) 1px 1px 1px, rgb(255, 255, 255) -1px -1px 1px, rgb(255, 255, 255) 1px -1px 1px, rgb(255, 255, 255) -1px 1px 1px; white-space: pre;

opacity: 1; font-family: 'Open Sans', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; fill: rgb(42, 63, 95); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

g.text: Where Do the Construction Materials for Data Centers in the U.S. Come From?
